unnormalised: Arre, Prof. Sharma, that was one heck of a lecture! Dr. Khan was right, your insights on the subject were spot on. Maybe next time, Mr. Verma from the audience can ask some more relevant questions, haha! Heard Ms. Iyer is also attending next week, looking forward to it.
normalised: Arre, Professor Sharma, that was one heck of a lecture! Doctor Khan was right, your insights on the subject were spot on. Maybe next time, Mister Verma from the audience can ask some more relevant questions, ha ha! Heard Missus Iyer is also attending next week, looking forward to it.
